Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Mundial, you'll be centrally located in Lisbon, steps from Sao Domingos Church and Figueira Square. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Martim Moniz Square and Hospital Sao Jose.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 350 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include safes and blackout drapes/curtains, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a rooftop terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. Additional features include babysitting/childcare (surcharge), shopping on site, and tour/ticket assistance. If you'd like to spend the day shopping, you can hop on the shuttle (surcharge).

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/caf√©. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Planning an event in Lisbon? This hotel has facilities measuring 2045 square feet (190 square meters), including a meeting room. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is Noon
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/caf√©. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Additional features include babysitting/childcare (surcharge), shopping on site, and tour/ticket assistance. If you'd like to spend the day shopping, you can hop on the shuttle (surcharge).
Make yourself at home in one of the 350 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include safes and blackout drapes/curtains, and housekeeping is provided daily.

With a stay at Hotel Mundial, you'll be centrally located in Lisbon, steps from Sao Domingos Church and Figueira Square. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Martim Moniz Square and Hospital Sao Jose.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Sao Domingos Church - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Figueira Square - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Martim Moniz Square - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Hospital Sao Jose - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
National Theatre of D. Maria II - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Dom Pedro IV Statue - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Rossio Square - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Castle of Sao Jorge - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Garagem Theater - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Lisbon Coliseum - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Santa Justa Elevator - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Restauradores Square - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Graca Viewpoint - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Foz Palace - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Armazens do Chiado Mall - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Mundial is Lisbon (LIS-Portela) - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

NOTE** NOTA** INFORMAMOS QUE APARTIR DE 01.01.2016 NA CIDADE DE LISBOA IRA SER COBRADO O VALOR DE 1 EURO DE CITY TAX POR PESSOA/NOITE ATE UM MAXIMO DE 7 EUROS POR PESSOA ******************************************************************************APARTIR DEL DIA 01.01.16 - CITY TAX PAGO DIRECTO EN EL HOTEL 1 EURO PERSONA Y NOCHE EN EL MOMENTO DEL CHECK IN CON COBRO MAXIMO DE 7 EUROS POR PERSONA ******************************************************************************WE HEREBY INFORM YOU THAT FROM 01.01.16 THE CITY OF LISBON WILL BEGIN TO CHARGE A CITY TAX OF 1 EURO PER PERSON7DAY UNTIL ONE MAX. OF 7 EUROS PERSON

Cancelaciones hasta una hora despues de la confirmacion sin gastos. CANCELLATIONS MADE UP TO ONE HOUR AFTER CONFIRMATION, CAN BE MADE FREE OF CHARGE.

Room 1
Check in: 2 p.m.Check out: 12 p.m.
Notice
From 01st January 2019, the City tax of Lisbon becomes 2‚Ç¨ per overnight stay and per person, up to a maximum total value of 14‚Ç¨ (Seven straight nights per overnight stay/person). Please note that the municipal fee it's NOT included in the room rate and it has to be paid by the guest at the check-out. Kids under 13 years are exempted.

Essential Information: Room 1
Hotel Tariff Notes: Note: From the 1st of August 2015, all rooms at Hotel Mundial will be non-smoking. Note :- Children accommodation is based on existing bed of Parents‚Äù ‚Äú NO Extra bed is available during period of 1 July ‚Äì 31 Aug ‚Äú Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated. NOTE FROM THE HOTEL: renovation of the Rooftop bar has been delayed, due to the bad weather. Please consider the beginning of June as the new date for the reopening. NOTE: Starting on the 01st of January 2019, the City tax will be changed to 2 ‚Ç¨ per day/person. The City tax is applicable to all guests staying in Hotels in Lisbon more than 13 years old.
